name: AUAudioUnitBusArray
desc: The AUAudioUnitBusArray class defines a container for an audio unitâ€™s input or output busses.

items.name: count
items.desc: The number of busses in the array.

items.name: isCountChangeable
items.desc: Determines whether the array can have a variable number of busses.

items.name: ownerAudioUnit
items.desc: The audio unit that owns the bus array.

items.name: busType
items.desc: Determines whether the bus array is for input or output.

items.name: setBusCount
items.desc: Changes the number of busses in the array.

items.name: addObserver
items.desc: Adds a KVO observer for a given property on all busses in the array.

items.name: removeObserver
items.desc: Removes a KVO observer for a given property on all busses in the array.

items.name: replaceBusses
items.desc: Replaces the current bus array with a copy of the supplied bus array.
